id.description: Unique identifier for this infrastructure provider within the cluster. Must start with a letter or underscore, can contain alphanumeric characters, underscores, and hyphens. Cannot end with a hyphen.

kind.description: Type of infrastructure. Currently only 'vm' is supported.

provider.description: Name of the platform. Currently only 'aws' is supported.

region.description: Geographic location where resources will be deployed (e.g., 'us-west-2' for AWS). Must be a valid region identifier for the specified provider.

infrastructure.description: List of infrastructure backends where nodes may be deployed.

id.description: Unique identifier for this node. Must start with a letter or underscore, can contain alphanumeric characters, underscores, and hyphens. Cannot end with a hyphen.

infrastructure_id.description: Reference to an entry in the 'infrastructure' array.

instance_type.description: The machine type or class used to provision this node, specific to the target infrastructure.

properties.description: General technical configuration of the node.

public_ssh_key.description: Path to local public SSH key.

high_level_domain.description: Top-level domain or subdomain that will be used for public devcontainer.

nodes.description: List of nodes where devcontainers will be deployed.

id.description: Unique identifier of this devcontainer within the cluster.

node_id.description: Identifier of the node that will host this devcontainer (must match an entry in the topâ€‘level nodes list).

url.description: Git repository URL containing the devcontainer definition. For SSH URLs (starting with 'ssh://' or 'git@'), an SSH key must be provided.

branch.description: Git branch to checkout. If not specified, the repository's default branch will be used.

devcontainer_path.description: Relative path to the devcontainer definition within the repository. If not specified, the root directory will be used.

reference.description: Reference identifier for the SSH key in the specified secret backend. Used to authenticate with private Git repositories.

source.description: Secret backend service where the private SSH key is stored. Must be either 'secrets_manager' or 'ssm_parameter_store'.

ssh_key.description: SSH key configuration for cloning from private Git repositories. Required for SSH URLs, must be omitted for HTTPS URLs.

source.description: Reference to the source location containing the devcontainer definition and related files.

port.description: TCP port used to expose the OpenVSCode Server interface. If not specified, an available port will be selected automatically. Must be omitted if DNS is configured at the node level.

openvscode_server.description: Optional web-based IDE access to the devcontainer via OpenVSCode Server.

port.description: TCP port used for remote SSH access to the devcontainer. If not specified, an available port will be selected automatically.

public_ssh_key.description: Path to the local public SSH key used for authentication. If omitted, the public SSH key configured at the node level will be used.

ssh.description: Optional access to the devcontainer via Secure Shell (SSH).

remote_access.description: Configuration for accessing the devcontainer remotely via SSH or a web-based IDE. OpenVSCode Server is enabled by default.

devcontainers.description: List of devcontainers that will be deployed on nodes.
